00044 void GEngine::initializeInputBindings() {
00045 
00046         m_inputBindings = new InputBinding[input_event_end];
00047 
00048         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < input_event_end; ++i) {
00049 
00050                 InputBinding * l_CurInput = &m_inputBindings[i];
00051                 l_CurInput->Keys = new EventBinding[KEYS_END];
00052 
00053         }
00054 
00055 }
00056 
00057 void GEngine::freeInputBindings() {
00058 
00059         if (m_inputBindings == 0)
00060                 return;
00061         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < input_event_end; ++i) {
00062 
00063                 InputBinding* l_curInput = &m_inputBindings[i];
00064 
00065                 if (l_curInput != 0 && l_curInput->Keys != 0)
00066                         delete[] l_curInput->Keys;
00067 
00068         }
00069 
00070         delete[] m_inputBindings;
00071 }

00073 bool GEngine::initialize() //Not much initialization to do yet =)
00074 {
00075         //A buffer for the log messages
00076         char logBuffer[512];
00077 
00078         //Create the engine configuration
00079         //TODO: Check the log exists if not create it etc
00080         m_engineCfg = new ConfigurationInstance(
00081                         static_cast<File*> (Filesystem::evaluateChild(
00082                                         Filesystem::getRoot(), "Saved/engine.cfg")));
00083 
00084         //Create a log for the engines core
00085         m_engineLog = new LogWriter(LogWriter::getPathToLogFile("Core"));
00086 
00087         //Get the graphicsAPI
00088         const char* graphicsAPIString = "OpenGL2";
00089 
00090         //Get a node to the configuration graphics API string
00091         ConfigurationNode* apiNode = m_engineCfg->getNode("Graphics/GraphicsAPI");
00092 
00093         //If the graphics API is specified as a string in the Cfg use that instead
00094         if (apiNode != 0 && apiNode->getType() == configurationString) {
00095 
00096                 ConfigurationString* apiString =
00097                                 static_cast<ConfigurationString*> (apiNode);
00098                 graphicsAPIString = apiString->getStringData();
00099 
00100         }
00101 
00102         //Initialize the games renderer. this function must be called before doing anything with the renderer
00103         if (GRenderer::getRenderer()->initialize(defaultWindowWidth,
00104                         defaultWindowHeight, graphicsAPIString) == false) {
00105 
00106                 //Unable to init the renderer so set the error state
00107                 setErrorDetails(
00108                                 "Unable to get a instance for the specified graphics API");
00109 
00110                 return false;
00111         }
00112 
00113         //Bind input events from the renderers window to our input postbox
00114         GRenderer::getRenderer()->getWindow()->setInputPostbox(&m_inputPostbox);
00115 
00116         //Create variables for the window height and width and set them to the defaults
00117         unsigned int renderWindowWidth = defaultWindowWidth;
00118         unsigned int renderWindowHeight = defaultWindowHeight;
00119 
00120         //Get a load of nodes for the engine settings
00121         ConfigurationNode* widthNode =
00122                         m_engineCfg->getNode("Graphics/Window/Width");
00123         ConfigurationNode* heightNode = m_engineCfg->getNode(
00124                         "Graphics/Window/Height");
00125         ConfigurationNode* titleNode =
00126                         m_engineCfg->getNode("Graphics/Window/Title");

00128                         "Graphics/Window/Fullscreen");

00130                         "Graphics/Fonts/defaultFont");
00131         ConfigurationNode* numberOfThreads = m_engineCfg->getNode("Engine/Cores");
00132 
00133         //If the configuration node doesn't exist or isn't a number then create a job engine
00134         if (numberOfThreads == 0 || numberOfThreads->getType()
00135                         != configurationNumber) {
00136                 m_threadHive = new BeeHive(1);
00137         } else {
00138 
00139                 //Otherwise use the number of threads configuration node value to create the BeeHive

00141                                 = new BeeHive(

00143

00150         if (widthNode != 0 && widthNode->getType() == configurationNumber) {
00151 
00152                 //Set the window width to the width nodes value
00153                 ConfigurationNumber* Number =
00154                                 static_cast<ConfigurationNumber*> (widthNode);
00155                 renderWindowWidth = Number->getValue();
00156         } /* NOTE: if it doesn't exist it will be set to the default value above */
00157 
00158         //If the height node exists and is a number
00159         if (heightNode != 0 && heightNode->getType() == configurationNumber) {
00160 
00161                 //Set the window height to the height nodes value
00162                 ConfigurationNumber* Number =
00163                                 static_cast<ConfigurationNumber*> (heightNode);
00164                 renderWindowHeight = Number->getValue();
00165 
00166         } /* NOTE: As above if  it doesn't exist it will be set to default */
00167 
00168         //Print this info to the log
00169         stringstream widthStrm;
00170         widthStrm << renderWindowWidth;
00171 
00172         m_engineLog->writeLine(TAG, string("Set width to ") + widthStrm.str());
00173 
00174         stringstream heightStrm;
00175         heightStrm << renderWindowHeight;
00176 
00177         m_engineLog->writeLine(TAG, string("Set height to ") + heightStrm.str());
00178 
00179         //Set the window dimensions to the variables
00180         GRenderer::getRenderer()->getWindow()->setDimensions(renderWindowWidth,
00181                         renderWindowHeight);
00182 
00183         string title = defaultWindowTitle;
00184 
00185         //If the window has a title node and it is a configuration string
00186         if (titleNode != 0 && titleNode->getType() == configurationString) {
00187 
00188                 ConfigurationString* string =
00189                                 static_cast<ConfigurationString*> (titleNode);
00190 
00191                 if (string->getStringData() != 0) {
00192 
00193                         //Set the window title to the configuration node value
00194                         title = string->getStringData();
00195                 }
00196 
00197         } /* NOTE: Otherwise set to default */
00198 
00199         //Print this info to the log
00200         m_engineLog->writeLine(TAG, string("Setting window title to ") + title);
00201 
00202         GRenderer::getRenderer()->getWindow()->setTitle(title.c_str());
00203 
00204         //If the window is supposed to be fullscreen hit that
00205         if (fullscreenNode != 0 && fullscreenNode->getType() == configurationNumber) {
00206 
00207                 ConfigurationNumber* fullscreenValue =
00208                                 static_cast<ConfigurationNumber*> (fullscreenNode);
00209 
00210                 //If the value is set to 1 (True)
00211                 if (fullscreenValue->getValue() == 1) {
00212 
00213                         //Fullscreen the window
00214                         GRenderer::getRenderer()->getWindow()->setFullscreen(true);
00215 
00216                         //State this in the log
00217                         m_engineLog->writeLine(TAG, "Using fullscreen if supported");
00218 
00219                 } else {
00220 
00221                         //Unfullscreenit
00222                         GRenderer::getRenderer()->getWindow()->setFullscreen(false);
00223 
00224                 }
00225 
00226         }
00227 
00228         //If the default font node is set in the config and is a file path
00229         if (defaultFontNode != 0 && defaultFontNode->getType()
00230                         == configurationString) {
00231 
00232                 //Set the defalt font renderer to load the specified font

00234                                 static_cast<ConfigurationString*> (defaultFontNode);
00235                 GRenderer::getRenderer()->getInterfaceManager()->getDefaultTextRenderer()->Load(
00236                                 (File*) Filesystem::evaluateChild(Filesystem::getRoot(),
00237                                                 string->getStringData()));
00238 
00239         }
00240 
00241         m_inputBindings = 0;
00242         initializeInputBindings();
00243 
00244         m_GameActive = false;
00245 
00246         m_eventManager = new EventManager();
00247 
00248         if (!m_eventManager) {
00249                 setErrorDetails("Couldn't create a new event manager");
00250 
00251                 return false;
00252         }
00253 
00254         m_engineLog->writeLine(TAG, "Initialized event manager");
00255 
00256         m_GamePaused = false;
00257 
00258         m_currentApplication = 0;
00259 
00260         m_canvasWidth = renderWindowWidth;
00261         m_canvasHeight = renderWindowHeight;
00262 
00263         m_engineLog->writeLine(TAG, "Intiailized engine");
00264 
00265         return true;

00268 void GEngine::uninitialize() {
00269 
00270         freeInputBindings();
00271 
00272         if (m_eventManager != 0) {
00273                 m_engineLog->writeLine(TAG, "Freeing event manager");
00274 
00275                 delete m_eventManager;
00276                 m_eventManager = 0;
00277         }
00278 
00279         if (m_engineCfg != 0) {
00280                 m_engineLog->writeLine(TAG, "Freeing the configuration instance");
00281 
00282                 delete m_engineCfg;
00283                 m_engineCfg = 0;
00284         }
00285 
00286         //Kill the thread hive
00287         if (m_threadHive != 0) {
00288                 m_engineLog->writeLine(TAG, "Killing the HIVE");
00289 
00290                 delete m_threadHive;
00291                 m_threadHive = 0;
00292         }
00293 
00294         //Write that the engine has been uninitialized to the log
00295         m_engineLog->writeLine(TAG, "Engine uninitialized");
00296 
00297         //Then destroy the log
00298         if (m_engineLog != 0) {
00299                 delete m_engineLog;
00300                 m_engineLog = 0;
00301         }
00302 
00303 }

00305 void GEngine::bindEvent(unsigned int Eve, input_event_ids id, key_ids key) {
00306         if (id > input_event_end)
00307                 return;
00308         if (key > KEYS_END)
00309                 return;
00310 
00311         m_inputBindings[id].Keys[key].Events.push_back(Eve);
00312 }

00317 
00318                 //usleep(m_fpsCalculator.getFPS() * 2);
00319 
00320         }

00324 void GEngine::sendEventManagerMessage(Input_Event iEvent) {
00325 
00326         //Get the binding related to that event ID
00327         InputBinding* inputBinding = &m_inputBindings[iEvent.Event_ID];
00328 
00329         //Trigger the event bound to that key
00330         if (iEvent.Event_Data.size() != 0) {
00331 
00332                 //Find the event binding for that key
00333                 EventBinding* eventBinding = &inputBinding->Keys[iEvent.Event_Data[0]];
00334 
00335                 //Find the list of events to fire from the event binding
00336                 std::vector<unsigned int>* eventsToFire = &eventBinding->Events;
00337 
00338                 //For each of those events
00339                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < eventsToFire->size(); i++) {
00340 
00341                         //Trigger the event within the event manager
00342                         m_eventManager->triggerEvent(eventsToFire->at(i),
00343                                         iEvent.Event_Data, iEvent.Event_Flags);
00344 
00345                 }
00346 
00347         }
00348 }
00349 
00350 void GEngine::processEvent(Input_Event event) {
00351 
00352         //If the Event ID is a mousepress scale the inputs to the right canvas width (As the canvas width may differ from the renderer width
00353         switch (event.Event_ID) {
00354 
00355         case input_event_button_one:
00356         case input_event_button_two: {
00357                 float eventX = event.Event_Data[1];
00358                 float eventY = event.Event_Data[2];
00359 
00360                 eventX = eventX / GRenderer::getRenderer()->getWindow()->getWidth();
00361                 eventX = eventX * m_canvasWidth;
00362 
00363                 eventY = eventY / GRenderer::getRenderer()->getWindow()->getHeight();
00364                 eventY = eventY * m_canvasHeight;
00365 
00366                 event.Event_Data[1] = eventX;
00367                 event.Event_Data[2] = eventY;
00368 
00369                 break;
00370         }
00371                 ;
00372         }
00373 
00374         //The next few lines send it through the interface manager. if the interface manager uses it then don't send it to the registered listener, otherwise send it to the registered listener
00375 
00376 
00377         //If the interface manager returns true on ProcessEvent
00378         if (GRenderer::getRenderer()->getInterfaceManager()->processEvent(event)
00379                         == true) {
00380 
00381                 //This event has been used by the interface manager, don't send it to the event manager
00382 
00383 
00384         } else {
00385 
00386                 //Send it to the event manager because the interfacemanager
00387                 sendEventManagerMessage(event);
00388         }
00389 }

00391 void GEngine::doFrameUpdate(float secondsPassed) {
00392 
00393         if (!m_GamePaused) {
00394 
00395                 if (m_physicsActive) {
00396 
00397                         //Process all physics
00398                         //TODO: REVISE PHYSICS - m_gamePhysics->Update(secondsPassed);
00399 
00400                 }
00401 
00402                 //Update all the rendering bits
00403                 GRenderer::getRenderer()->update(secondsPassed);
00404 
00405                 //Update the application
00406                 if (m_currentApplication != 0) {
00407 
00408                         m_currentApplication->updateApplication(secondsPassed);
00409 
00410                 }
00411 
00412         }
00413 
00414 }
00415 
00416 int GEngine::gameLoop() {
00417 
00418         if (m_errorState == true) {
00419                 setErrorDetails(
00420                                 "Cannot enter game loop when the engine is in a error state");
00421                 return -1;
00422         }
00423 
00424         m_GameActive = true;
00425         m_physicsActive = true;
00426 
00427         m_clock.initialize();
00428         float secondsPassed;
00429 
00430         while (m_GameActive) {
00431 
00432                 secondsPassed = m_clock.calculateElapsedTime();
00433 
00434                 //Alert to the FPS calculator of a new frame
00435                 m_fpsCalculator.frame(secondsPassed);
00436 
00437                 //Run through the postbox and trigger events
00438                 while (m_inputPostbox.HasNext()) {
00439 
00440                         processEvent(m_inputPostbox.ReadNext());
00441 
00442                 }
00443 
00444                 doFrameUpdate(secondsPassed);
00445 
00446                 //Rendering Step
00447 
00448                 GRenderer::getRenderer()->renderScene(m_canvasWidth, m_canvasHeight);
00449 
00450                 //End of rendering step
00451 
00452                 //Sleep
00453                 f_sleep();
00454         }
00455 
00456         return 0;
00457 }

00459 bool GEngine::loadApplication(GApplication* App) {
00460 
00461         //If the engine is in a error state then can't load a application
00462         if (m_errorState == true) {
00463                 setErrorDetails(
00464                                 "Cannot load application if a error occured prior to load call");
00465                 return false;
00466         }
00467 
00468         //If there is currently a application loaded return false
00469         if (m_currentApplication != 0) {
00470                 return false;
00471         }
00472 
00473         if (App->onLoad(this) == false) {
00474                 return false;
00475         }
00476 
00477         m_currentApplication = App;
00478 
00479         return true;
00480 }
00481 
00482 bool GEngine::unloadApplication() {
00483 
00484         if (m_currentApplication == 0) {
00485                 return true;
00486         }
00487 
00488         m_currentApplication->onUnload();
00489 
00490         m_currentApplication = 0;
00491 
00492         return true;
00493 }

00495 void GEngine::setErrorDetails(const char* str) {
00496         if (m_errorDetails != 0)
00497                 delete[] m_errorDetails;
00498 
00499         char* newErrorDetails = new char[strlen(str) + 1];
00500         m_errorDetails = newErrorDetails;
00501 
00502         strncpy(newErrorDetails, str, strlen(str) + 1);
00503 
00504         m_engineLog->writeLine( TAG, string("Error details set as ") + m_errorDetails);
00505 
00506         m_errorState = true;
00507 }
